name: Hootsuite
description: Add a Hootsuite instance to connect to Hootsuite account to the social Hub, allowing you to manage messages, teams , members of the organizations across multiple social elements. You will need  Hootsuite account information to add an instance.

configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter
configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector

configuration.name: Filter null values from the response
configuration.description: Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. The valid query parameters are socialNetworkType, socialNetworkId & targetSocialNetworkId. A valid query would be: <i>socialNetworkType='Twitter' and socialNetworkId=82295100 and targetSocialNetworkId=876713392311902208\n</i&gt The socialNetworkType, socialNetworkId and targetSocialNetworkId are required filters;

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size. Defaults to 200 if not provided. Maximum of 2000

parameters.name: nextPage
parameters.description: Cursor to a specific page in the result set. Defaults to the first page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

resources.description: Search for organizations that the authenticated member is in

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size. Defaults to 200 if not provided. Maximum of 2000

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. The valid query parameters are endTime, startTime, status and socialProfileIds. A valid query would be: startTime='2017-06-21' and endTime='2017-06-28'

parameters.name: nextPage
parameters.description: Cursor to a specific page in the result set. Defaults to the first page.

parameters.name: oauth.user.refresh_token
parameters.description: Taking the refresh token from the response

parameters.name: oauth.user.token
parameters.description: The access token from the response

parameters.name: oauth.user.refresh_interval
parameters.description: The interval that the oauth needs to be refreshed at
